cast.overview: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookies, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewellers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
cast.title: Snatch

cast.overview: American expat Mickey Pearson has built a highly profitable marijuana empire in London. When word gets out that he’s looking to cash out of the business forever it triggers plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.
cast.title: The Gentlemen

cast.overview: A cold and mysterious new security guard for a Los Angeles cash truck company surprises his co-workers when he unleashes precision skills during a heist. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman's ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score.
cast.title: Wrath of Man

details.biography: James Warren is from London and before becoming and actor and filmmaker represented Great Britain in Judo for twelve years winning a Gold medal at the 2002 Commonwealth Games. Warren has appeared in five Guy Ritchie films, worked with Oscar winning Director Guiseppe Tornatore (Cinema Paradiso) and most recently Tom Paton playing the role of Bartlett in the upcoming 400 Bullets.
details.name: James Warren
